-[pilot] Wait, that's too many. -I'm not going.
translation.ko: - 안에 태워요 - 사람이 너무 많아 - 난 안 가요 - 안 간다니

translation.en: What do you mean you're not going?
I'm not going, Eric. Go!
translation.ko: 난 안 갈 거야, 얼른 타!

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Sarah!
Sarah!
Sarah, look! -Leo! -[car honking]
Leo!
Leo Beiderman! Leo!
Leo!
-Leo! -Thank God!
You don't have any time. You have to go now.
-Dad. No, no, no. -Put this on, put this on.
Daddy, what are you doing?
I want you to take the baby. Why? No, no, no, no, no, Mom.
-[Chuck] Yes. No arguments, please! -No, no, no, no, no.
translation.ko: - 세라, 이럴 시간 없어 - 엄마, 가기 싫어요

translation.en: -I don't wanna go! I don't wanna go! -Grab his foot, honey.
-Mom? Mom! -Come on. No, listen to me.
Sweetheart, listen to me. Let go. Put this on.
translation.ko: 아가, 엄마 말 들어 어서 가렴, 제대로 입고!

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you too.
I've always loved you. -I love you. -[baby crying]
-[Vicky] Take care, honey. -I'll see you soon!
-Put this on. -I'll see you soon! I'll see you soon!
[Chuck] Get out of here, Leo. Go. Go to high ground.
translation.ko: - 그래 - 어서 가거라, 리오 고지로 가

translation.en: When I was 11, I took $32 from your wallet.
When you were a baby,
I once dropped you on your head.
When you came to the studio and you brought those pictures,
I lied when I said I didn't remember.
translation.ko: 기억 안 난다고 한 건 거짓말이에요

translation.en: I remember everything.
I remember that we were right over there,
and that's when Mom got that picture of the house.
It was a perfect, happy day.
I came down here to let you know that.
Thank you.
I've missed you since then.
I missed you too.
Beiderman.
Daddy. [sobbing]
Hold on!
[Tanner] This is Messiah. We're ready to begin our run.
Are our families there yet? They're on their way, Messiah.
Disengage auto path.
Here we go.
We're at perigee. Wolf contact in four minutes, 45 seconds.
We'll never be closer to home than we are right now.
translation.ko: 고향과 이렇게 가까이 있을 일은 이제 없겠지

translation.en: [Leo] Come on!
Messiah, we got some people here that want to talk to you.
translation.ko: 메시아, 자네들과 얘기하길 원하는 사람이 있다

translation.en: Wendy, honey.
You promise me you'll keep doing your church thing,
and I'll be there right next to you.
Haunting you.
You better come back and haunt me.
I love you.
There's Mommy. Hello, Mommy.
[Andrea] Hey, you take care of Daddy for me, okay?
She will. She does a good job.
-She misses Mommy. -[Andrea] I miss you.
I love you, Mommy.
I love you. Very, very much.
David...
You know what I want to say.
translation.ko: 내가 무슨 말 하고 싶은지 알지?

translation.en: [David] I know.
[Leo] Come on!
[Andrea] Wolf contact in two minutes, 30 seconds.
[Mitch] Oren, Mariette is at your folks' place up in Utah.
We sent a plane for her, but she isn't here yet.
Fish, your sons are both on active duty.
We tried to get them back, but we couldn't get them here on time.
I'm sorry.
Well, Mitch, uh... I want to say goodbye to Mary.
translation.ko: 미치, 메리에게 작별 인사 하고 싶어

translation.en: I want to tell her I love her.
And that ever since we've been apart, every day, I think about her.
translation.ko: 아내가 떠난 후 한 번도 잊은 적이 없었어

translation.en: Mary, I'm coming home.
[Andrea] Coming up on target, 625 miles.
Range 600 miles.
Wait! Oh, God, wait!
Wait! I'm coming!
Oren? Oren, are you there?
Mariette? I'm here. I can hear you.
[crying] Hi, sweetie.
-[Oren] Mariette? -Baby, this is your father.
His name is Oren. I named him after you.
-[Oren] Hello, Oren. -[chuckles]
-Show him what you brought him. -[Oren] What happened?
He's holding up a little rocket.
That's a mighty powerful rocket you got there.
-[Mark] He's laughing. -[laughing]
I can hear him. I know.
Mariette... I'm hugging you both right now.
translation.ko: 매리엣, 당신과 아이를 지금 꼭 껴안고 있어

translation.en: I'm holding you.
[Andrea] Twenty-five seconds. Prepare to synchronize the nukes.
[Andrea] Twenty-three... 22... 21...
It's been a pleasure serving with you, Commander.
The honor's all mine, Andy.
[Oren] Be good, Oren.
Be good.
[President Beck] We watched as the bombs shattered the second comet
translation.ko: 우리가 보았듯이 폭파된 두 번째 혜성은

translation.en: into a million of pieces of ice and rock
that burned harmlessly in our atmosphere
translation.ko: 아무런 피해를 주지 않은 채 대기권에서 전소됐으며

translation.en: and lit up the sky for an hour.
Still, we were left with the devastation of the first.
translation.ko: 하지만, 첫 혜성 충돌로 인한 여파는 여전히 남아 있습니다

translation.en: The waters reached as far inland as the Ohio and Tennessee valleys.
It washed away farms and towns,
forests and skyscrapers.
But the water receded.
The wave hit Europe and Africa too.
Millions were lost.
Countless more left homeless.
translation.ko: 셀 수 없을 정도로 많은 사람들이 집을 잃었습니다

translation.en: But the waters receded.
Cities fall,
but they are rebuilt.
And heroes die,
but they are remembered.
We honor them with every brick we lay,
with every field we sow,
with every child we comfort and then teach to rejoice
translation.ko: 아이를 달래고 우리가 다시 받은 것에 대해

translation.en: in what we have been regiven.
translation.ko: 기뻐할 것을 가르칠 때마다 그들을 기릴 겁니다

translation.en: Our planet.
Our home.
So now, let us begin.
